channel.title: ODV on The Ocean Code
channel.description: Recent content in ODV on The Ocean Code

item.title: ODV figures in R
item.description: Objective With more and more scientists moving to open source software (i.e.Â R or Python) to perform their numerical analyses the opportunities for collaboration increase and we may all benefit from this enhanced productivity. At the risk of sounding sycophantic, the future of scientific research truly is in multi-disciplinary work. What then could be inhibiting this slow march towards progress? We tend to like to stick to what is comfortable.
